nodes.text: Snees were a species of sentient avians. Those long-beaked creatures were no bigger than a human's fist, including the span of their blue wings. Bobbajo, a Nu-Cosian wanderer, once told a story involving a snee to the residents of Reestkii, who were being detained in their town hall building by a group of Zygerrian slavers. Snees were well known as being neurotic, having adapted to an incredibly placid homeworld.
